Hi Michael,

I just added 3 tiny contributions to the "Feature Request" tra=
cker I'd
like to see in the forthcoming release. Those are:

- [1545840] Co=
ntentLengthFilter (multi-purpose content-length based
filter. either  deter=
mines length via HTTP header when used as
midfetch filter or otherwise base=
d on actual downloaded document size)

- [1545842] SuccessfulFetchFilter (s=
imple stupid HTTP 2xx filter)

- [1545847] a way to simply tell heritrix to=
 look for its configs in a
different location.

Would be happy to see some =
or all of them in the forthcoming release
(would make updating alot easier =
for me ;-) )

Any comments are welcome
  Olaf Freyer
